article: There is a happy truth to be shared with all who would notice. The truth has been expressed as: April _ bring May flowers. This is a truth that prom ises light would burst _ darkness, strength would be born from _ and if one dares to believe this, he would 39 _ in doing what he plans to do. Farmers all over the world know the _ of the seasons. They know that there is a season to plant and a season to _ ; everything must be done in its own time. _ the rain pours down, stopping all _ activities, farmers lift their _ to the heavens and smile. Despite the inconvenience, they know that the rain _ the nourishment their crops need to grow and flourish . The rains in the month of April give rise to the beautiful flowers in the month of May. But this ancient truth tells us more than that-it is an _ message of hope to all who experience tragedy in life. A broken relationship with one can open up the door to a new friendship with another. A _ job here can provide the opportunity for a better job there. A _ dream can become the foundation of a wonderful future. _ this: Darkness may last for a night, but it will never overcome the _ of the morning. When you are in a _ of sorrow, don't be depressedbecause a season of joy may be just around the corner .
